about_the_game:
Go old school with The Classic Bundle for Evil Dead: The Game in a variety of outfits that take the team back to their roots, along with some fiery demonic outfits.

The Classics Bundle includes:

• Ash Williams College Outfit
• Ash Williams Hunter Outfit
• Annie Knowby Explorer Outfit
• Ed Getly Explorer Outfit
• Cheryl Williams Browntown Outfit
• Scotty College Outfit
• Warlord Demon Firefighter-Themed Costume Pack
detailed_description:
Go old school with The Classic Bundle for Evil Dead: The Game in a variety of outfits that take the team back to their roots, along with some fiery demonic outfits.

The Classics Bundle includes:

• Ash Williams College Outfit
• Ash Williams Hunter Outfit
• Annie Knowby Explorer Outfit
• Ed Getly Explorer Outfit
• Cheryl Williams Browntown Outfit
• Scotty College Outfit
• Warlord Demon Firefighter-Themed Costume Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 / Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700/ Ryzen 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 Ti/ RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard

short_description: Go old school with The Classic Bundle for Evil Dead: The Game in a variety of outfits that take the team back to their roots, along with some fiery demonic outfits.
